Articles.Content:
Hi, 

I think KSP is a great place for people who have certain skills with pc`s. I don´t  

Last year I bought a new Pc, only components. I built it by myself, but I have no idea, what to get out of this machine. (MB,Ram,Graphics, all are OC parts)

 

My profession is photography, so my preference for the setup would be something that supports my Job (e.g. as fast as possible Photoshop handling) AND a configuration to get the most out of KSP, of course!!!  

Is there someone, living in Germany near Cologne or Düsseldorf, who could check and tune my pc (ofc for a serious payment). 

 

I hope this is the right place to post this request

 

Best regards and MERRY CHRISTMAS!!  

 

Phil
If you are in Germany i would suggest visiting the Hardwareluxx or PCGH-Extreme forums for such requests, you are way more likely to find someone who can help you there...
